# vU64Divide(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Unsigned 64-bit division.

## Declaration

```swift
func vU64Divide(_ vN: vUInt32, _ vD: vUInt32, _ vRemainder: UnsafeMutablePointer<vUInt32>?) -> vUInt32
```

## Integer Arithmetic Functions (from vBasicOps.h)

- **vU64AddS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vS64AddS(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vU128Add(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit addition (modular arithmetic).
- **vU128AddS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vS128Add(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit addition (modular arithmetic).
- **vS128AddS(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vU64SubS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vS64SubS(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vU128Sub(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit subtraction (modular arithmetic).
- **vU128SubS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vS128Sub(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit subtraction (modular arithmetic).
- **vS128SubS(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vU8HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Unsigned 8-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vS8HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Signed 8-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vU32HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Unsigned 32-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
